text: In this article, we'll explore how to create an interactive face-tracking effect using AI-generated images.
The tutorial walks you through generating facial variations with an AI model,
setting up a Node.js script for automated image handling,
and implementing smooth cursor and device motion tracking in the browser with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
By preloading images, it ensures smooth transitions without live AI processing,
making it quick and accessible even on slower devices.
Be sure to check out the full article for detailed steps and start your own project.
